description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Toxic Trash is a puzzle game that requires quick thinking. Use combos and power-ups such  as recycling to give your score a boost. Beware! Toxic Trash will make the timer tick twice as fast! Two modes available for play with three difficulties and 21 challenging awards to unlock.
